distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libbsd fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-20367: Fixed an out-of-bounds read during a comparison for a symbol names from the string table (bsc#1160551).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: nlist.c in libbsd before 0.10.0 has an out-of-bounds read during a comparison for a symbol name from the string table (strtab).
notes.title: CVE description
